translations: n.暴发户；自命不凡的人；傲慢自负的人

sentences.sentence: Schwab and other upstarts made billions.
sentences.translation: 嘉信理财和其他股市新贵却获利数以十亿。

sentences.sentence: Will this rise in upstarts lead to the next big idea in tech?
sentences.translation: 这一波新增的企业会给未来的高科技带来高招妙策吗？

sentences.sentence: There is also every reason to believe that the current recession will produce lots of upstarts.
sentences.translation: 我们非常有理由相信，目前的衰退会催生很多新企业。
